generate_data.name: Generate data
generate_data.description: Uses AI to run a task that generates data.

instructions.name: Instructions
instructions.description: Instructions on what needs to be done.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: Entity ID to run the task on. If not provided, the preferred entity will be used.

structure.name: Structured output
structure.description: When set, the AI Task will output fields with this in structure. The structure is a dictionary where the keys are the field names and the values contain a 'description', a 'selector', and an optional 'required' field.

attachments.name: Attachments
attachments.description: List of files to attach for multi-modal AI analysis.
